About Us Desc: Knowing Cuba, discovering places, kicking cities, we love to TRAVEL! We are Cubaguia, we wrote to help you discover Cuba, you will not be wrong.
About Us Desc1: We will try to capture the steps to take to discover destinations and not get lost in them. We will help when choosing where to eat or where to sleep through our experience.
About Us Desc2: Any questions we will be happy to answer.
